    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)

    • initializeTemporaryTables

      protected void initializeTemporaryTables()
      Creates temporary tables and indexes on their columns used for route search in the local GTFS database. As they are temporary, when the app is exited and connection to the database is closed, the tables will get automatically deleted.

    • populateStops

      protected List<Stop> populateStops(ResultSet stops)
      Populates a list of Stops
      Parameters:
      stops - ResultSet containing shapes to load into array
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Stop objects containing information about stop

      protected List<Shape> populateShapes(ResultSet shapes)
      Populates a list of Shapes
      Parameters:
      shapes - ResultSet containing shapes to load into array
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Shape objects containing shape node coordinates and sequence number

    • populateTravelAdvice

      protected boolean populateTravelAdvice(int limit)
      Populates ArrayList of TravelAdvice objects with information from temporary Matched Trip table and other database tables
      Parameters:
      limit - integer of how many travel advices to load intro array
      Returns:
      boolean idicating whether sql queries succeeded

    • findMatchingTrips

      protected boolean findMatchingTrips()
      Populates a temporary table in the GTFS database with trips that go through start and end stops, in the appropriate direction
      Returns:
      boolean indicating whether the operation executed successfully

    • filterTripsServiceRunning

      protected boolean filterTripsServiceRunning()
      Filters the temporary Matched Trips table to only include tuples for trips which are running on the current day
      Returns:
      boolean indicating whether the operation succeeded

    • filterTripsEarlyDepartures

      protected boolean filterTripsEarlyDepartures(String time)
      Filter the remporary trips table to only include those trips that depart from the current system time onwards
      Parameters:
      time - Optional override for current time. Expected format: "hh:MM:ss". Pass null if you want to use current system time at each execution
      Returns:
      boolean indicating if the operation was successful

    • findTripTimeTaken

      protected boolean findTripTimeTaken()
      Finds the total time taken (travel time, stop time) for each trip and inserts it into the "time_taken" column of the temporary trips table
      Returns:
      boolean indicating whether the operation was succesful

    • getCountPossibleTrips

      protected int getCountPossibleTrips()
      Gets the current count of rows in the temporary matching trips table
      Returns:
      int corresponding to the row count

    • findNearestStops

      protected boolean findNearestStops(double lat, double lon, int stopCount, boolean startLocation, boolean accessibilityPrioriy)
      Function to populate temporary table in the GTFS database with the nearest stops for either the start or destination locations
      Parameters:
      lat - latitude of location
      lon - longtitude of location
      stopCount - integer indicating how many stops near the coordinates should be retreived into the temporary table
      startLocation - boolean idicating if the stops for the start location (true) or destination (false) are being requested
      accessibilityPrioriy - boolean whether to prioritize wheelchair boarding available stops
      Returns:
      boolean indicating whether the query was successful
